Adding a column to track the points balance update will help you monitor when the points are credited to your account. This will give you a clear picture of your points earnings and help you identify any discrepancies.

**Points Balance Update Column:**

1. Add a new column to the "Email Confirmations" sheet, e.g., "Points Balance Update"
2. In this column, enter the date when the points are updated in your loyalty program account
3. You can also add a note or comment to indicate the new points balance, if desired

This will help you keep a record of when the points are credited to your account and ensure that you're earning points correctly.

**Checking Your Email:**

Don't forget to check your email for the confirmation from The Daily Grind! Make sure to verify that you've received the points for your purchase last Wednesday. If you haven't received the points, you can follow up with The Daily Grind's customer service to resolve the issue.

Remember to update your spreadsheet with the confirmation details, including the points earned and the points balance update. This will help you stay organized and ensure that you're keeping track of your loyalty program activity accurately.

Stay on top of your loyalty programs, and happy tracking!
